programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o insremotM.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> nchnls = 1
insremot "192.168.1.100", "192.168.1.101", 1
instr 1 aq barmodel 1, 1, p4, 0.001, 0.23, 5, p5, p6, p7 out aq endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 0.5 3 0.2 500 0.05 i1 0.5 0.5 -3 0.3 1000 0.05 i1 1.0 0.5 -3 0.4 1000 0.1 i1 1.5 4.0 -3 0.5 800 0.05 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
